general.add_to_homescreen_1: Install this webapp on your iPhone: tap

game.pause_tooltip: Pause and resume the game by clicking on the counter

onboarding_points.description: A team scores one point for each guess. If opposite team notices breaking the rules, you lose and the round goes to the next team. If draw occurs, the team with less skipped card wins.
onboarding_points.title: Points

onboarding_presentation.description: Describe the keyword avoiding forbidden words.
onboarding_presentation.title: Presentation

onboarding_team.title: Team
onboarding_team.description: Split your friends into teams, the team contains two persons. It’s a turn-based game: while one team is presenting, other teams are watching.
